title: Nexa Esports
description: Nexa Esports is a next-generation gaming and clan management PWA for Call Of Duty Mobile that connects players, teams, and tournament organizers(a future feature) in one ecosystem. It features role-based dashboards, live leaderboards, auto-payments, and in-app rewards to make esports organized, rewarding, and social.

title: Presently
description: Presently is a real-time, location-verified attendance register PWA for universities. It verifies student attendance through GPS geofencing, real-time monitoring, and timetable validation, ensuring authenticity and accuracy in academic records.

title: SummaStudy
description: SummaStudy is a student-focused academic progressive web app built to help undergraduates improve grades through curated resources, verified tutors, and personalized study insights. It provides access to notes, past questions, and tutorial bookings within an engaging, gamified experience.

title: EduReach
description: EduReach is an open-source initiative tackling Nigeria's education crisis. Join us in building innovative solutions for digital access, employability, and quality learning.

title: Tripout.co
description: Tripout.co is a travel agency that helps you plan any kind of trip, short weekend holiday, or a vacation, while helping you save the money needed to pay the trip fees.

title: CivicTrack
description: CivicTrack is an open database platform designed to promote political transparency in Africa, focusing on Nigerian politicians.

title: EkoStudy
description: EkoStudy is an online learning platform for students in tertiary institutions which houses resources that are easy to understand and contain only the essentials needed for great performance in their academics.

title: TripLoga
description: Triploga is an online learning platform for students in tertiary institutions which houses resources that are easy to understand and contain only the essentials needed for great performance in their academics.

title: StatEase
description: A user-friendly statistics app for descriptive analysis, data visualizations, and inferential statistics

title: EduConnect
description: A platform for students to ask questions and to answer questions for improvements in their academics through aid from more knowledgeable people such as: class mates, teachers, mentors, e.t.c

title: STEM-HUB
description: A web app for interactive STEM learning through simulations, games, and other engaging activities

title: NextGen Health
description: A website developed to support waste management efforts, combining efficiency with an eco-conscious design.

title: LevelUp Recyclers
description: A website developed to support waste management efforts, combining efficiency with an eco-conscious design.

title: Silent Note Passing Protocol (SNPP)
description: A light-weight web messaging application for passing of notes without talking.

title: ReleCloud
description: ReleCloud is a space travel agency...

title: CHEF
description: An e-commerce website specializing in the sales of kitchen wares

title: NodeFall
description: NodeFall is a game-hosting platform that allows users to host games on their servers

title: ZORIN PC
description: A web version of the Zorin OS interface.
